btrplace.solver.choco

Interface ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams, ReconfigurationAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultChocoReconfigurationAlgorithm

    public interface ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithm
extends ReconfigurationAlgorithm, ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams
    A reconfiguration algorithm based on the Choco constraint solver.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getStatistics

        SolvingStatistics getStatistics()
        Get statistics about the last solved problem.
        Returns:
        some statistics, null if no problem has been solved for the moment

      • solve

        ReconfigurationPlan solve(Model i,
                          Collection<SatConstraint> cstrs)
                   throws SolverException
        Compute a reconfiguration plan to reach a solution to the model. The MinMTTR optimization constraint is used
        Parameters:
        i - the current model
        cstrs - the satisfaction-oriented constraints that must be considered
        Returns:
        the plan to execute to reach the new solution or null if there is no solution.
        Throws:
        SolverException - if an error occurred while trying to solve the problem

      • getInstanceSolver

        InstanceSolver getInstanceSolver()
        Get the solver used to solve a problem.
        Returns:
        the current used solver

      • setInstanceSolver

        void setInstanceSolver(InstanceSolver p)
        Set the solver to use to solve a problem.
        Parameters:
        p - the runner to use
